example.title: Examples
example.p: This section contains examples of how the shortdesc element can be used.

fig.title: Short description in a topic
fig.p: The following code sample shows how a shortdesc element can be used in a topic:
fig.codeblock: <topic id="intro-to-bird-calling"> <title>Introduction to bird calling</title> <shortdesc>If you want to attract more birds to your Acme Bird Feeder, learn the art of bird calling. Bird calling is an efficient way to alert more birds to the presence of your bird feeder. </shortdesc> <body> <!-- ... --> </body> </topic>

fig.title: Short description in a map
fig.p: The following code sample shows how a short description can be used in a DITA map to provide information about a non-DITA resource. The content of the shortdesc element is used when a link preview to the Web site for the American Birding Association is generated.
fig.codeblock: <map> <title>Enjoying birds</title> <topicref href="birds-in-colorado.dita"/> <topicref href="bird-calling.dita"/> <topicref href="https://www.birding.example.com/" format="external" type="html"> <topicmeta> <shortdesc>The American Birding Association is the only organization in North America that specifically caters to recreational birders. Its mission is to "inspire all people to enjoy and protect wild birds." </shortdesc> </topicmeta> </topicref> </map>
